name: Vegetables
overview: A Match 3 game for the Commodore 64! Originally released for the RGCD C64 16KB Cartridge Game Development Competition 2019. The objective in this addictive puzzle release for the C64, is basically to swap adjacent shapes to form lines of three or more in a row, with each successful swap giving you an ever higher score! And that's pretty much a small description of this rather enjoyable game, but for further info including how to remove those annoying immovable blocks please make sure to check out the detailed source page below.
